resources.string: Sends anonymous data weekly to GF-Droid Metrics (requires "Keep install history")
GF-Droid needs the storage permission to install this to storage. Please allow it on the next screen to proceed with installation.
Apps installed by GF-Droid as CSV file

No apps installed.\n\nThere are apps on your device, but they are not available from GF-Droid. This could be because you need to update your repositories, or the repositories genuinely don\'t have your apps available.
If your friend has GF-Droid and NFC turned on touch your devices together.
